creator: Easyelife
descriptionHtml:
Live Weather Forecast & Alerts is a great weather tracker, detects weather forecasts in your current location automatically. This live weather app provides the fastest weather forecast, real-time alerts, severe weather warnings, accurate hourly & 10-day forecasts & more.
Be prepared for the daily forecast or sudden changes in weather with live alerts and accurate weather forecasts.

🌥 Accurate weather forecasts
Intuitively understand the current weather status. Display the most comprehensive and useful weather information, Live weather 24/7 and check up to 10 days in advance.

🌀 Severe Weather Alerts
From storm alerts to heavy rain, get all the severe weather warnings you needs. Using the best storm radar, the storm alert service will let you know about dangerous thunderstorm activity approaching your area.

🌂 Weather trend
Helps you check weather more clearly: 48-hour real feel temperature, wind speed, visibility, 10-day precipitation(rate and total), 10-day or 48-hour UV index.

🌈 Weather Widget
The widget displays weather information in a compact format on the home screen. Weather forecast also has built-in many gorgeous theme style widgets to meet your needs.

🌍 World Weather
Covers worldwide, in all cities. Global weather data at your fingertips!

⭐ Key features for Accurate weather forecast
- Live weather, today weather, tomorrow weather, 48 hour weather, 10 days weather
- Real-time weather radar & Weather maps
- Current and “Feels like” temperature
- Pressure and precipitation information
- Visibility distance
- Wind speed and wind direction
- Sunrise and sunset time
- Weather on the status bar
- Live animations and graphics, Simple interface
- Totally free for all features

Real-time weather updates. Rainy, snowy, stormy or cloudy weather, you can stay one step ahead with Live Weather Forecast’s weather radar.
descriptionShort: Weather Forecast with rain alarm & storm radar, It's your personal assistant.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
V1.1.1
💖Add multiple languages for more users
🎉Provide global accurate weather forecast
👌Stylish and cute desktop widgets
🌸More gorgeous widgets design, more intuitive UI
🎊Improve efficiency, faster to manage weather infos
🎈Convenient interaction design, better experience

creator: Easyelife
descriptionHtml:
Live Weather Forecast & Alerts is a great weather tracker, detects weather forecasts in your current location automatically. This live weather app provides the fastest weather forecast, real-time alerts, severe weather warnings, accurate hourly & 10-day forecasts & more.
Be prepared for the daily forecast or sudden changes in weather with live alerts and accurate weather forecasts.

🌥 Accurate weather forecasts
Intuitively understand the current weather status. Display the most comprehensive and useful weather information, Live weather 24/7 and check up to 10 days in advance.

🌀 Severe Weather Alerts
From storm alerts to heavy rain, get all the severe weather warnings you needs. Using the best storm radar, the storm alert service will let you know about dangerous thunderstorm activity approaching your area.

🌂 Weather trend
Helps you check weather more clearly: 48-hour real feel temperature, wind speed, visibility, 10-day precipitation(rate and total), 10-day or 48-hour UV index.

🌈 Weather Widget
The widget displays weather information in a compact format on the home screen. Weather forecast also has built-in many gorgeous theme style widgets to meet your needs.

🌍 World Weather
Covers worldwide, in all cities. Global weather data at your fingertips!

⭐ Key features for Accurate weather forecast
- Live weather, today weather, tomorrow weather, 48 hour weather, 10 days weather
- Real-time weather radar & Weather maps
- Current and “Feels like” temperature
- Pressure and precipitation information
- Visibility distance
- Wind speed and wind direction
- Sunrise and sunset time
- Weather on the status bar
- Live animations and graphics, Simple interface
- Totally free for all features

Real-time weather updates. Rainy, snowy, stormy or cloudy weather, you can stay one step ahead with Live Weather Forecast’s weather radar.
descriptionShort: Weather Forecast, Weather, Live Weather channel, daily & hourly Alarm & Radar.

creator: Easyelife
descriptionHtml:
Live Weather Forecast & Alerts is a great weather tracker, detects weather forecasts in your current location automatically. This live weather app provides the fastest weather forecast, real-time alerts, severe weather warnings, accurate hourly & 10-day forecasts & more.
Be prepared for the daily forecast or sudden changes in weather with live alerts and accurate weather forecasts.

🌥 Accurate weather forecasts
Intuitively understand the current weather status. Display the most comprehensive and useful weather information, Live weather 24/7 and check up to 10 days in advance.

🌀 Severe Weather Alerts
From storm alerts to heavy rain, get all the severe weather warnings you needs. Using the best storm radar, the storm alert service will let you know about dangerous thunderstorm activity approaching your area.

🌂 Weather trend
Helps you check weather more clearly: 48-hour real feel temperature, wind speed, visibility, 10-day precipitation(rate and total), 10-day or 48-hour UV index.

🌈 Weather Widget
The widget displays weather information in a compact format on the home screen. Weather forecast also has built-in many gorgeous theme style widgets to meet your needs.

🌍 World Weather
Covers worldwide, in all cities. Global weather data at your fingertips!

⭐ Key features for Accurate weather forecast
- Live weather, today weather, tomorrow weather, 48 hour weather, 10 days weather
- Real-time weather radar & Weather maps
- Current and “Feels like” temperature
- Pressure and precipitation information
- Visibility distance
- Wind speed and wind direction
- Sunrise and sunset time
- Weather on the status bar
- Live animations and graphics, Simple interface
- Totally free for all features

Real-time weather updates. Rainy, snowy, stormy or cloudy weather, you can stay one step ahead with Live Weather Forecast’s weather radar.
descriptionShort: Weather Forecast, Weather, Live Weather channel, daily & hourly Alarm & Radar.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
V1.6.1
💯Performance optimization, run more stable
🔥Fixed known issues, improve user experience

V1.6.0
💐Replace the radar chart for better performance
💖Optimize the layout for a better experience
✨Performance optimization, faster information display

V1.5.3
🎉Modify small problems, better performance
